name: com.rmc.rmc-mini-mvcs
description: Mini MVCS (Model View Controller Service) library for Unity Development by Rivello Multimedia Consulting
author: RMC (github.com/SamuelAsherRivello)

samples.description:
Beginner examples for education and inspiration of proper usage.

These are **required** to follow along with the training course.
samples.path: RMC Mini MVCS/Samples~/RMC Mini MVCS - 1. Beginner Examples
RMC Mini MVCS/Samples~/RMC Mini MVCS - 2. Advanced Examples

samples.displayName: RMC Mini MVCS - 3. Unity Gaming Services Examples
samples.description: Examples which require upfront setup of Unity Gaming Services (https://unity.com/solutions/gaming-services).
samples.path: RMC Mini MVCS/Samples~/RMC Mini MVCS - 3. Unity Gaming Services Examples
